heading: HR00109
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION AND THE COMMISSION ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION TO CONDEMN, CALL FOR REFUND, AND INVESTIGATE, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE CONTINUED COLLECTION OF OTHER SCHOOL FEES IN SEVERAL STATE UNIVERSITIES VIOLATING REPUBLIC ACT 10931, ALSO KNOWN AS THE "UNIVERSAL ACCESS TO QUALITY TERTIARY EDUCATION"
